report.title: Get plots for plot group ID
report.description: Get a list of plots for a selected plot group.
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM locations plot LEFT JOIN locations_websites lw on lw.location_id=plot.id AND lw.deleted=false JOIN groups_locations gl ON gl.location_id = plot.id AND gl.group_id = #recording_group_id# AND gl.deleted = false JOIN location_attribute_values lav ON lav.location_id = gl.location_id AND lav.int_value = #plot_group_id# AND lav.location_attribute_id = #plot_group_location_attr_id# AND lav.deleted=false WHERE plot.location_type_id in (#plot_location_type_ids#) AND #website_filter# AND plot.deleted=false

param.name: plot_group_id
param.display: Plot Group ID to get plots for

param.name: plot_group_location_attr_id
param.display: Location attribute ID that holds the plot group for a plot
